description: A delicious and filling fall salad!
name: Roasted Butternut Squash & Sweet Chili Chickpea Salad
recipeIngredient: 1 medium butternut squash, peeled, seeded and diced
4 1/2 teaspoons oil, divided (your favorite cooking oil)
1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
5 ounces baby kale, or your favorite greens

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oven to 400 degrees F. On a large sheet pan, toss together cubed butternut squash, 2 teaspoons olive oil and a pinch of salt and pepper. Bake butternut squash until fork tender, about 40 minutes.

While butternut squash is baking, heat a large skillet over medium heat and add 1/2 teaspoon oil, chickpeas, chili powder, maple syrup and a pinch of salt. Cook chickpeas for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add your greens to a large bowl and toss together with 2 teaspoons olive oil, juice of 1/2 a lemon and 3 teaspoons nutritional yeast (optional).

To assemble: add the butternut squash, chickpeas, dried cranberries and pepitas to your greens and mix until combined. Top each individual serving with a drizzle of tahini, you may need to thin your tahini out with water or lemon juice if itâ€™s thick.
